Name: Greetje
Review Text: Amazing!! We did the summer tasting menu. And ordered the veal and chicken entrees. Food was delicious and the people were so incredibly friendly and kind. I plan on recommended this to everyone.

Name: Greetje
Review Text:
Greetje is a very good restaurant offering a modern Dutch cuisine. The tasting menu is excellent.
The service is friendly and professional, and really efficient for Amsterdam.
I really recommend this place.

Review Text: The food was amazing, I had the autumn set menu and every course was excellent. Quantity was also abundant, and bread with some very tasty spreads was provided too. Service was good, though when I walked into the place the waiter claimed it …

Name: Greetje
Review Text: AMAZING Dutch cuisine!! This was my favorite meal in Amsterdam. Elegant and delicious. The staff were very kind and helpful.

Review Text: The staff are friendly and funny. They provide very local dutch food . We enjoyed it very much. Strongly recommend duck liver sandwich as starter! It’s amazing!!!( pic 3)

Review Text: Very good food, service were a little slow despite that there only were 3 tables with people. Nice view from the bathrooms :)

Name: Greetje
Review Text: I was pleasantly surprised by the food and the staff. The staff paces the courses well and were extremely accommodating form the minute you walk in. The food was delicious and not too heavy or overbearing as traditional fare can be. I found the pheasant full of flavor and their homemade bread was exceptional.

Name: Greetje
Review Text: Absolutely fantastic. We did the full high tea for lunch and we were very pleased. Everything is homemade and was delicious. The carrot red pepper with coconut milk soup with a drizzle of truffle oil was the best soup I have ever eaten! The …

Name: Greetje
Review Text: Really wonderful food. Very friendly front of house, lovely atmosphere. The good really was superb - we held off from ordering the full tasting menu, but I had a really lovely dish of crayfish tails followed by plaice. My son went for the …

Name: Greetje
Review Text: The food was delicious, service quite nice, and the location is close to Amsterdam center. Worth the visit!

Name: Greetje
Review Text: Amazing food, super service and a lovely atmosphere.

Name: Greetje
Review Text: Our hotel recommended Greetje for dinner and boy did it not disappoint. Their service, attention to detail and overall demeanor was top notch, not to mention the food. Doing the tasting menu of all the appetizers, selecting your own main …

Name: Greetje
Review Text:
Excellent meal, great service and a friendly attentive staff. It is a little pricey, but well worth it to have a delicious taste of Dutch quisine.
I had the rabbit and my wife had the veal. Both were great. Don't leave without a cappuccino and some mulled wine for the road.

Name: Greetje
Review Text: This was an excellent meal. We didn't do the full tasting menu (we skipped dessert), but the appetizer tower and entrees were spectacular.  I highly recommend the appetizer tower where you sample dutch dishes reimagined. My favorites were …

Name: Greetje
Review Text: Amazing place. Very quaint great food and a very reasonable price.

Name: Greetje
Review Text: Amazing food--high Dutch culinary art

Name: Greetje
Review Text: Delicious food and friendly service. I totally recommend!!!

Name: Greetje
Review Text: I reserved the table as a surprise for my partner's birthay. Rene,the owner helped with all arrangements. When we arrived we were welcome by the owner and invited to the table. We chose the menu to try everything from the starters and …

Name: Greetje
Review Text: Excellent Dutch restaurant! Staff very friendly. I recommend the tasting menu for 53 euro for an additional 4 euro you get to taste all their desserts. I have eaten in 2 Michelin stars in the past I find restaurant to be reasonably priced. Would definitely re visit if I am ever in Amsterdam

Name: Greetje
Review Text: Be prepared to be welcomed and served with politeness and ravishing smiles throughout your entire evening at Greetje. The food is super delicious, second to none and the ambience is top notch. Very cozy and chic. Highly recommended, thank me later.

Name: Greetje
Review Text: Excellent food, great atmosphere. The owner is a nice guy and serves real Dutch food. There aren't many restaurants that offer modern Dutch food. They will explain the dishes they serve, and what ingredients they used. They will make an effort to talk to you in your own language. Yes, it is expensive, but worth the money.

Name: Greetje
Review Text: Our last night of vacation, and I wanted to eat here.  The decor is beautifully Dutch, it's located in a nice area close to lots of hotels, and the food was amazing.  The waitstaff were all very nice.  I heard a couple inquiring if the …

Name: Greetje
Review Text: Had very great and nice waiters, but literally took 3 hours for ONLY starters and main dishes. We paid for dessert but ended up leaving due to the wait. Also, I saw other people got their main dishes over a hour after their starters too. …

Name: Greetje
Review Text: Very good food and atmosphere. Get the seat next to the kitchen. The prep work on each dish is amazing and better than any cooking show you have ever watched.  The prices weren't bad either. 2 glasses of wine, a main course, and desert all for under 55 euros.

Name: Greetje
Review Text: Friendly staff, great selection of food and tasty!

Name: Greetje
Review Text: We chose the "fall menu" with duck, wild bar and dessert which were all excellent. The staff was helpful, friendly and informative which left a great taste as we left with a cup of take-a-away glühwein, also given by the staff. Price-quality ratio on point. Totally recommend 5/5

Name: Greetje
Review Text: I have never been to a restaurant like it. If you love genuinely interesting food, you need to try this. Strong Dutch and European flavours served delicately. The place has a nice atmosphere conducive of the enjoyment of food and the owner …

Name: Greetje
Review Text: Traditional Dutch cuisine, in a nice place and good service. Food was delicious.

Name: Greetje
Review Text: The food was delicious - definitely order the tasting menu, it's absolutely worth it plus you get to try lots of different flavours. The staff were also lovely.

Name: Greetje
Review Text: The staff was very  friendly and the place is nice but we found it a bit expensive and service a bit slow.

Name: Greetje
Review Text: We hadn't booked on a Friday night, but were welcomed and seated straight away.  The owner was friendly, the waiter extremely helpful.  We had wanted to eat in a restaurant with Dutch food and weren't at all disappointed.  A treat meal for the end of a week's cycling.

Name: Greetje
Review Text: We were seated and waited around 15 mins before even receiving the menu. We decided to leave after given the slow service. Given the prices (at least 100 euros for two people to eat and drink) we expected better service. The manager was apologetic about the slow service at least. We left before eating.

Name: Greetje
Review Text: Good traditional Dutch food and excellent service

Review Text: Second evening here?just pooped on on the off chance last night. I have a disabled client with me who has trouble with holding a knife and fork. Staff and manager were superb. Made a dish of finger food and tonight created something …

Name: Greetje

Name: Greetje
Review Text: The staff was great with recommendations and explaining each dish. The food was fantastic. We had to come back a second time before we left. Highly recommend you eat here

Name: Greetje
Review Text: One of the best places I have been to in Amsterdam. This place offers real Dutch food, the service is great and the food is delicious. Definitely recommended. Small tip, if it is your first time, try the Deluxe Tasting menu to find your favourite starter and dessert

Name: Greetje
Review Text: 2.5 - I don't think this place is for everyone. It has some pretty interesting flavours which I wasn't a fan of and the service was slow and the food was quite pricey. I'd say give it a go if you would consider yourself an adventurous eater …

Name: Greetje
Review Text: The food is really good so no comments there. It was a really great food experience. The atmosphere was terrible though. It was super quiet and serious. I can imagine that it would be better on a Friday in the middle of winter but personally I wouldn't go again.

Name: Greetje
Review Text: Wonderful place, great and tasty food. We were suggested to eat there by Lonely Planet. It is not a cheap restaurant but the Veal and Rabbit my boyfriend and I ordered were sublime. My advice is to save some extra money to taste Greetje's …

Name: Greetje
Review Text: Excellent place, excellent service, excellent food. The best restaurant in the town. The staff is very kind and the food is great and healthy. We recommend this restaurant.

Review Text: They have a decent menu with food from uncommon materials. The price is slightly higher than a normal mid/mid-high restaurant, but not particularly more tasty.

Name: Greetje
Review Text: Cozy restaurant with good service and fine cuisine. Would definitely come again.

Name: Greetje
Review Text: The main dish cod is so plain even with the sauce. The peach desert tastes like one from a supermarket. The waiter is quite defensive and blames me for having a wrong expectation. The dinner costs €68 for one. Besides, this is a place full of tourists. No locals at all.

Name: Greetje
Review Text: My girl said they had the best potato in the world. The Deluxe Tasting Menu offers all delicious Dutch food, must-try for tourists.

Name: Greetje
Review Text: This place serves amazing Dutch cuisine. I had the pollock, and my companion had the veal. Both were very good, the pollock being one of the best fish dishes I have ever tasted. The licorice ice cream and the crème brûlée were also fantastic. Our final bill was about 36€ per person. I would definitely visit again.
